intro: Xanthochrysum, commonly known as the golden everlasting, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its bright yellow flowers that resemble small suns. The plant is known for its long-lasting blooms, which retain their color and form even when dried. Xanthochrysum is often used in floral arrangements and as a natural dye due to its vibrant hue. Its botanical name reflects its golden color and enduring nature.
